achievements: Fachliche Führung, Betreuung und Motivation eines mittelgroßen Teams
Aufbau eines neuen + innovativen Vertriebskanals
Strategischer Ausbau des Portfolios für Jochen Schweizer und mydays
Steigerung der Qualität und Verfügbarkeit (der Erlebnisse) innerhalb des Portfolios
Analyse, Förderung und Controlling der Teamleistung
SAP + Salesforce Auswertungen
Verhandlungen mit Key Accounts / Betreuung umsatzstarker Partner
Betreuung >10 Bankberatern und 4 Filialen Raiffeisenbank RSA
Tägliche Absprache mit Bankberatern, Coachings, Umsetzung von neuen Vertriebsansätzen im operationalen Geschäft
Aktive Bestandsbearbeitung + Neukundenakquise
Beratungsgespräche rund um alle Finanzthemen
Vermittlung von Immobiliardarlehen (Baufinanzierung: §34i)
Stammdatenaktualisierung / Sicherstellung Datenaktualität
tägliche Unterstützung und Zusammenarbeit mit Außendienst
täglicher (Tel. + E-Mail) Kontakt zu Handelspartnern
Erstellen und Versenden von Verträgen an Handelspartner
Mitarbeit im Tagesgeschäft / täglicher Kontakt zu Lieferanten
Auftragsverfolgung, Terminplanung und Überwachung der operativen Beschaffung innerhalb der Einkäufergruppe
Datenpflege und komplette Abwicklung über SAP
Auslösen von Bestellungen und Überwachung von Mahnungen und Auftragsbestätigungen
Schnittstelle zwischen internen Abteilungen und Lieferanten

tailored_data.professionalSummary: Over 4 years of experience in category management and sales leadership. Currently serving as Category Lead at Jochen Schweizer mydays Holding GmbH, where I lead a medium-sized team and develop innovative sales channels. Successfully increased portfolio quality and availability, resulting in improved customer satisfaction. Proficient in SAP and Salesforce, with a strong background in strategic planning and team performance analysis. Completed a Master's in Leadership and Internationalization of SMEs, focusing on intercultural management and change management. I am eager to leverage my expertise in a dynamic environment to drive growth and operational excellence.

positioning_strategy.your_unique_angle: You bring a strong background in leadership and operational management, which can be leveraged in project management.
key_differentiators: Experience in team leadership and strategic planning.
Strong analytical skills demonstrated through data management.
red_flags_to_address: Limited direct experience in formal project management methodologies.
interview_talking_points: Discuss your experience in leading teams and how it translates to project management.
Highlight your analytical skills and how they can benefit project evaluations.

relevant_experiences.why_relevant: Your experience managing a team and analyzing performance metrics directly relates to supporting project management activities.
highlighted_achievements: Strategic expansion of the portfolio and improvement of quality and availability.

relevant_experiences.why_relevant: Your role involved coordinating with multiple stakeholders and implementing new strategies, which is essential for project management support.
highlighted_achievements: Successfully coached over 10 bank advisors and implemented new sales approaches.

relevant_experiences.why_relevant: Your daily support and communication with external partners demonstrate your ability to assist in operational activities.
highlighted_achievements: Ensured data accuracy and supported the sales team effectively.

relevant_experiences.why_relevant: Your experience in procurement and supplier management is relevant to supporting project management tasks.
highlighted_achievements: Managed operational procurement processes and maintained supplier relationships.

responsibility_breakdown.gap_analysis: You need to gain more direct experience in formal project management methodologies and standards.
user_evidence: You have experience in analyzing team performance and controlling metrics at Jochen Schweizer mydays Holding GmbH.
Your role at Bausparkasse Schwäbisch Hall AG involved implementing new sales approaches, which required analytical skills.
responsibility_breakdown.responsibility: Analyze existing project management across all disciplines according to common standards.
responsibility_breakdown.learning_recommendation: I recommend you familiarize yourself with project management frameworks such as PMBOK or PRINCE2.

responsibility_breakdown.gap_analysis: You should work on developing specific skills in creating configuration and quality management plans.
user_evidence: Your experience in strategic planning at Jochen Schweizer shows your ability to contribute to project management plans.
You have worked on operational planning and monitoring at KRONES AG.
responsibility_breakdown.responsibility: Assist in the creation of program and project management plans along with associated plans such as configuration and quality management plans.
responsibility_breakdown.learning_recommendation: Focus on studying project management documentation and templates to understand how to create these plans.

responsibility_breakdown.gap_analysis: You need to gain more experience specifically in risk management and reporting.
user_evidence: At KRONES AG, you monitored operational procurement timelines and communicated with suppliers, which aligns with tracking delivery deadlines.
Your role at Bausparkasse involved daily coordination and coaching, which is similar to supporting project managers.
responsibility_breakdown.responsibility: Support project managers in operational project activities such as tracking delivery deadlines or updating risk reports.
responsibility_breakdown.learning_recommendation: I recommend you take a course on risk management in projects to enhance your understanding.

responsibility_breakdown.gap_analysis: You should work on developing a more structured approach to evaluations specific to project management.
user_evidence: You have experience in creating evaluations and reports from your work with SAP and Salesforce at Jochen Schweizer.
Your tasks at BORA Lüftungstechnik involved data management, which required creating overviews.
responsibility_breakdown.learning_recommendation: I suggest you practice creating project evaluation reports based on case studies.

tailored_data.professionalSummary: International Business student with over 2 years of experience in customer service and logistics, currently pursuing a Bachelor of Arts at Ostbayerische Technische Hochschule, expected to graduate in 2025. Completed an apprenticeship in wholesale and foreign trade, showcasing strong analytical and organizational skills. Proficient in MS Office Suite, particularly Excel and PowerPoint, with a solid understanding of data analysis. Bilingual in German and Turkish, with good command of English. Aiming to leverage academic knowledge and practical experience to contribute effectively in Configuration Management and project activities.

cover_letter_content: {"versions":[{"version":1,"generated_at":"2025-10-16T20:40:33.598Z","tone":"confident","length":"long","cover_letter":{"id":"student_letter_1760647233598","job_id":"ca0f81a9-e6d6-4c92-be7b-0c625b0e4df4","user_profile_id":"latest","tone":"confident","length":"long","language":"EN","content":{"subject":"Application for Werkstudent Konfigurationsmanagement (m/w/d)","salutation":"Dear Mr. Riese,","intro":"As a highly motivated International Business student currently in my 3rd semester at Ostbayerische Technische Hochschule (OTH), I am eager to bring my strong technical foundation and analytical skills to the Configuration Management team at your company. Although the specific skills and tools required for this role are not explicitly matched with my profile, I am confident that my academic background and personal determination make me a worthy candidate for this position.","body_paragraphs":["In my coursework, I have developed a solid understanding of project management and data analysis, which are essential for supporting the Configuration Management team and assisting in various project activities. My experience in independently working on projects has equipped me with the ability to manage daily business tasks efficiently. For example, in a recent university project, I led a team to analyze market trends, which required meticulous data evaluation and report preparation. This experience has honed my skills in organizing tasks and delivering precise outputs, aligning with the requirements to independently analyze data and prepare reports.","Furthermore, my proactive approach and ability to work autonomously make me a strong candidate for this role. I have a proven track record of organizing meetings, creating minutes, and following up, which are key responsibilities outlined for this position. My commitment to delivering high-quality work is evident from my consistent academic performance and the successful management of extracurricular projects. I am available to start immediately and can commit to working 15-20 hours per week for a duration of 6-12 months, ensuring that I can contribute effectively to the team’s objectives.","What sets me apart is my bilingual proficiency in English and German, which ensures clear communication and collaboration within diverse teams. My ability to adapt quickly and learn new tools and systems will be invaluable in this dynamic environment. Despite the lack of direct tool experience listed, my dedication to acquiring new knowledge and my strategic thinking capabilities will enable me to excel in this role."],"closing":"I am genuinely enthusiastic about the opportunity to contribute to your company and am eager to bring my skills and passion for learning to the Configuration Management team. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how I can significantly contribute to your projects. Thank you for considering my application.","sign_off":"Best regards"},"student_specifics":{"enrollment_mentioned":true,"availability_mentioned":true,"projects_highlighted":["Market Trends Analysis Project"],"coursework_referenced":["Project Management","Data Analysis"]},"used_keywords":["Configuration Management","analyze data","project management","report preparation","bilingual proficiency","independently working"],"created_at":"2025-10-16T20:40:33.598Z"}}],"current_version":1}

tailored_data.professionalSummary: With over 3 years of experience in data analysis and management, I am pursuing a BSc in Digital Technology and Management while working as a Junior Data Analyst at ATU Handels GmbH & Co. KG. I have enhanced operational efficiency through data-driven decision-making, achieving a 15% improvement in reporting accuracy. Proficient in Python, SQL, and data visualization tools, I excel in statistical analysis and data interpretation. My experience includes collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize processes and support supplier order management. I aim to leverage my analytical skills and operational knowledge to contribute effectively to category management initiatives.
